name: Simchella
description:
Create your own festival!
Build, Create, Be Seen!

The biggest festival in the world is now available in your pocket.
Bring your festival to life and watch your festival goers interact with each other.

Features:
- Plan your bands and timelines
- Create your stages
- Hire Bands
- Set up concession stands
- Festival goers have real needs and desires

Do you have what it takes to put on the ultimate festival?
